name: 3D Mahjong Slot Pro
description:
It is beautiful 3D mahjong game which completes the hands of mahjong on a slot machine.

By touching each drum, you can stop the rotation.

Please aim at not only a high score but achievement of all the hands of mahjong.

FEATURES:

Game Center Support.
Mahjong game of slot machine style.
East-South-West-North Sequence system.
Each round that ends in a few seconds
The time required of the game is only several minutes.
Full 3D graphics animation by OpenGL.
Extremely easy operation.
The achievement frequency and the score, etc. of every 'mahjong hands' are recorded.
Help screen and score screen by 3D graphics.
Score screen where 'mahjong hands' that changes every time at random is seen.
Penalty method by special rule "Cheat".
Change skin by touch in Help screen.
